job_history.work_description: Executed and reported variance and gap analysis. Monitored and analyzed Key Performance Indicators (KPI) and financial ratios. Tracked, analyzed and interpreted trends in data. Analyzed pricing and sales for all business products. Developed financial analysis reports and presentations by applying acquired financial principles. Analyzed businesses of varying sizes to determine the financial impact of potential investments. Manipulated data using pivot tables, pivot charts and macros. Evaluated return-on-investment and profit-loss projections. Planned and managed budgets in excess of $. Created sales strategies to promote advertising offerings and motivate larger deals. Completed strategic competitive analysis by assessing strengths and weaknesses of competitors. Managed trade on new product releases. Worked effectively in a heavily cross-functional, fast paced environment. Researched and resolved billing and invoice problems. Created training manuals for our trade system. Led team training. Provided a high level support to sales representatives and customers. Recommended changes to existing methods to increase the accuracy and efficiency of our ROI. Generated and distributed weekly reports. Lead on and off-site support across multiple time zones.

Examine claims forms and other records to determine insurance coverage. Investigate and assess damage to property and review property damage estimates. Interview or correspond with claimants, witnesses, police, or other relevant parties to determine claim settlement, denial, or review. Review police reports and physical property damage to determine the extent of liability. Negotiate claim settlements and recommend litigation when settlement cannot be negotiated. Analyze information gathered by investigation, and report findings and recommendations. Refer questionable claims to investigator or claims adjuster for investigation or settlement. Collect evidence to support contested claims in court. Examine titles to property to determine validity and act as company agent in transactions with property owners. Evaluate practicality of repair as opposed to payment of market value of vehicle before accident. Determine salvage value on total-loss vehicle. Arrange to have damage appraised by another appraiser to resolve disagreement with shop on repair cost. Keep records of customer interactions or transactions, recording details of inquiries, complaints, or comments, as well as actions taken.

Interview prospective clients to obtain data about their financial resources and needs, the physical condition of the person and to discuss any existing coverage. Call on policyholders to deliver and explain policy, to analyze insurance program and suggest additions or changes, or to change beneficiaries. Seek out new clients and develop clientele by networking to find new customers and generate lists of prospective clients. Calculate premiums and establish payment method. Contact underwriter and submit forms to obtain binder coverage. Attend meetings, seminars and programs to learn about new products and services, learn new skills, and receive technical assistance in developing new accounts. Ensure that policy requirements are fulfilled, including any necessary medical examinations and the completion of appropriate forms. Customize insurance programs to suit individual customers, often covering a variety of risks.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial analysis, including variance and gap analysis, KPI monitoring, financial ratio analysis, and data trend analysis, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in data analysis, including data manipulation using pivot tables, pivot charts, and macros, and data interpretation, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has experience in planning and managing budgets in excess of $, suggesting strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Sales Strategy
skills.explanation: Has experience in creating sales strategies to promote advertising offerings and motivate larger deals, showing a solid working proficiency in sales strategy.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience in leading team training and providing high-level support to sales representatives and customers, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in communicating effectively with customers, sales representatives, and other stakeholders, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has experience in researching and resolving billing and invoice problems, and evaluating practicality of repair as opposed to payment of market value of vehicle, suggesting strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Insurance Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in examining claims forms and other records to determine insurance coverage, and negotiating claim settlements, showing a solid working proficiency in insurance analysis.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for data manipulation and analysis, suggesting strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel.
